## Zero

[![MIT License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/oneachina/Zero)](LICENSE)
[![Build Status](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/oneachina/Zero/build.yml)](https://purpurmc.org/downloads/)

[![Stargazers](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/oneachina/Zero?label=stars&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/PurpurMC/Purpur/stargazers)
[![Forks](https://img.shields.io/github/forks/oneachina/Zero?label=forks&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/PurpurMC/Purpur/network/members)
[![Watchers](https://img.shields.io/github/watchers/oneachina/Zero?label=watchers&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/PurpurMC/Purpur/watchers)

Zero is a Purpur fork, Aimed at optimizing the player experience. It is a drop-in replacement for [Paper](https://github.com/PaperMC/Paper/) servers built on top of [Purpur](https://github.com/PurpurMC/Purpur/).

</div>

## Downloads
Downloads can be obtained from the [release page](https://github.com/oneachina/Zero/releases).

[![Action Status](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/oneachina/Zero/build.yml?branch=master&event=push&label=Action%20Release)](https://github.com/oneachina/Zero/releases)

## API

### [Javadoc](https://purpurmc.org/javadoc)

### Dependency Information
Maven
```xml
<repository>
    <id>purpur</id>
    <url>https://repo.purpurmc.org/snapshots</url>
</repository>
```
```xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.purpurmc.purpur</groupId>
    <artifactId>purpur-api</artifactId>
    <version>1.21.11-R0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <scope>provided</scope>
</dependency>
```

Gradle
```kotlin
repositories {
    maven("https://repo.purpurmc.org/snapshots")
}
```
```kotlin
dependencies {
    compileOnly("org.purpurmc.purpur:purpur-api:1.21.11-R0.1-SNAPSHOT")
}
```

Yes, this also includes all API provided by Paper, Spigot, and Bukkit.

## Building and setting up

#### Initial setup
First, <u>clone</u> this repository. Do not download it.

Then run the following command in the root directory:

```
./gradlew applyAllPatches
```

The project is now ready for use in your IDE.

#### Creating a patch

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md).

#### Compiling

Use the command `./gradlew build` to build the API and server. Compiled JARs
will be placed under `zero-api/build/libs` and `zero-server/build/libs`.
**These JARs are not used to start a server.**

To compile a server-ready purpurclip jar, run `./gradlew createMojmapBundlerJar`.
To install the `zero-api` and `zero` dependencies to your local Maven repo, run `./gradlew publishToMavenLocal`. The compiled purpurclip jar will be in `zero-server/build/libs`.

### YourKit

[YourKit](https://www.yourkit.com/), makers of the outstanding Java profiler,

and [.NET](https://www.yourkit.com/.net/profiler) application profilers. We thank them for allowing us to use their
software so we can make Purpur the best it can be.
